name: vaidya-dhara
description: AI-Driven Public Health Chatbot - Smart India Hackathon 2025

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:init
scripts.db:init: cd backend && python -c "from app.database import init_db; init_db()"
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul & cd ../backend && rmdir /s /q __pycache__ 2>nul & echo Cleaned

author: Vaidya Dhara Team
